title: GRAPH Presidents Job Approval Rating pattern

content.prompt: Which of the following statements reflects a pattern in the line graph?

choices.label: Nixon had the highest approval ratings of any president in the graph.
Most presidents exit office with lower approval ratings than when they entered office.
Most presidents begin their term with approval ratings lower than 50%.
Eisenhower had the lowest approval ratings of any president in the graph.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
